SYNOPSIS:- Mazhalai Pattalam (1980) Tamil
Mazhalai Pattalam is loosely based on the Hindi movie Khatta Meetha. Its about the marriage of two middle-aged who each has children of their own.
A comical family drama that looks into how two separate families struggle to get along and live with one another. With eleven children in tow, things took a turn when Gowri found out that Uma is pregnant!
